statements: SELECT * FROM ConcertSchedule;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date FROM ConcertSchedule ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT concert_name, concert_time FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE concert_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE ticket_availability = TRUE;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date, concert_time FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE concert_date >= '2023-01-01' AND ticket_availability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE concert_date > '2022-01-01' AND ticket_availability = TRUE ORDER BY concert_date ASC, concert_time DESC;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date, concert_time FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE ticket_availability = TRUE AND concert_name LIKE 'Rock%' ORDER BY concert_date ASC;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date, concert_time FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE concert_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND ticket_availability = TRUE;
SELECT concert_id, concert_name, concert_date, concert_time FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE concert_date = CURRENT_DATE AND ticket_availability = TRUE ORDER BY concert_time;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_concerts, MIN(concert_date) AS first_concert_date, MAX(concert_date) AS last_concert_date FROM ConcertSchedule;
SELECT * FROM concerts;
SELECT name, date FROM concerts ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, time FROM concerts WHERE ticket_availability > 100;
SELECT id, name FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT * FROM artists ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, date, time, ticket_availability FROM concerts WHERE date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT name, date FROM concerts WHERE ticket_availability > 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM concerts JOIN artists ON concerts.name = artists.name WHERE artists.genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY concerts.date ASC;
SELECT name, genre FROM artists WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM concerts WHERE ticket_availability < 10);
SELECT * FROM concerts WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY ticket_availability DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ConcertSchedule
SELECT concert_name, concert_date FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE tickets_available > 0
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM Venue ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT concert_name, concert_time FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE concert_date > '2022-08-15'
SELECT concert_name, ticket_price FROM ConcertSchedule INNER JOIN TicketSales ON ConcertSchedule.concert_id = TicketSales.concert_id
SELECT concert_name, concert_date, concert_time FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE tickets_available > 0;
SELECT * FROM Venue WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY venue_name DESC;
SELECT venue_name, venue_location, capacity FROM Venue WHERE capacity < 1000 LIMIT 3;
SELECT concert_name, ticket_price FROM ConcertSchedule JOIN TicketSales ON ConcertSchedule.concert_id = TicketSales.concert_id WHERE TicketSales.ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC;
SELECT concert_name, tickets_sold FROM ConcertSchedule JOIN TicketSales ON ConcertSchedule.concert_id = TicketSales.concert_id GROUP BY concert_name HAVING SUM(tickets_sold) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM concerts;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date, concert_time FROM concerts WHERE ticket_availability > 0;
SELECT artist_name, genre, nationality FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM venues WHERE capacity >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE is_available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM concerts;
SELECT concert_id, concert_name, concert_date, concert_time FROM concerts WHERE ticket_availability > 0;
SELECT artist_name, genre, nationality FROM artists ORDER BY nationality ASC, genre DESC;
SELECT * FROM venues WHERE capacity >= 1000 ORDER BY venue_name DESC;

SELECT tickets.ticket_id, concerts.concert_name, venues.venue_name, tickets.price FROM tickets JOIN concerts ON tickets.concert_id = concerts.concert_id JOIN venues ON concerts.concert_id = venues.venue_id WHERE tickets.is_available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Concerts;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date, concert_time FROM Concerts WHERE ticket_availability > 0;
SELECT artist_name, artist_genre FROM Artists ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT venue_name, venue_capacity FROM Venues WHERE venue_capacity >= 500 ORDER BY venue_capacity DESC;
SELECT concert_name, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM ConcertSchedule INNER JOIN Concerts ON ConcertSchedule.concert_id = Concerts.concert_id ORDER BY schedule_date ASC, schedule_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Concerts ORDER BY concert_date DESC, concert_time ASC
SELECT concert_name, concert_date, concert_time FROM Concerts WHERE ticket_availability > 0
SELECT artist_name, artist_genre FROM Artists WHERE artist_genre = 'Rock'
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM Venues WHERE venue_capacity > 500
SELECT concert_name, ticket_price FROM Concerts INNER JOIN Tickets ON Concerts.concert_id = Tickets.concert_id ORDER BY ticket_price DESC
